rules_text:
Discipline [i](This creature gains abilities from its types. Whenever it enters or you put a counter on it, it gains your choice of these types.)[/i]
[b]Rogue[/b] | Instant spells you cast cost {1} less to cast and can't be countered.
[b]Wizard[/b] | Sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast and can't be countered.
